casebody.data:
James P. KELLY, Plaintiff-Appellant, v. GULF OIL CORPORATION, Defendant-Appellee. No. 6978. Circuit Court of Appeals,- Third Circuit. June 28, 1939. Abraham E. Freedman, of Philadelphia, Pa., for appellant. Leslie C. Krusen, of Philadelphia, Pa., for appellee.

Before BIGGS, CLARK, and BIDDLE, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

The judgment of the court below is affirmed upon the opinion of Maris, J., 28 F.Supp. 205.
